title: The Secret of Life - And Where to Find it
description:
ZaMM, It's not a hippie book - It's the key to Reality. 

Saturday February 13th Meetup Group 3PM EST: https://www.meetup.com/zen-and-the-art-of-motorcycle-maintenance-reading-group/events/276299485/ 

ZaMM: https://www.amazon.com/Robert-Pirsig-Motorcycle-Maintenance-Reissue/dp/B00HTK12TW/ref=sr_1_3?crid=H0RAGRHUZQZB&dchild=1&keywords=zen+and+the+art+of+motorcycle+maintenance&qid=1613011165&sprefix=zen+and+t%2Caps%2C174&sr=8-3 

Lila: https://www.amazon.com/Lila-Inquiry-Robert-M-Pirsig/dp/0553299611/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=Lila+pirsig&qid=1613011238&sr=8-1

transcript_parts.text: hi there
robert imperson's metaphysics of quality
is a theory that makes much better sense
of reality
than is our customary dualistic way of
seeing things
at the top of the hierarchy is not the
truth of socrates aristotle and the
enlightenment
instead it's quality because truth
always updates
but quality is eternal even better
quality is the creative force of the
universe
it always has been and always will be
and to learn to connect
to it is the beginning of a meaningful
life intrigued
start here with these great classics
that despite being issued by academic
philosophy
hold the secret to a quality existence
if you want some community around your
reading
we are in the middle of a meetup group
reading zen in the art of motorcycle
maintenance the first book
and the more classic of the two and it
is really turning out well
the discussions are as edifying as any
chautauqua and if you want to know what
chautauqua is about you have to read zen
in the art of motorcycle maintenance
we're still fairly early in the book and
next week we will be on chapter 12.
there are 32 chapters in the book
it is not necessary to have followed the
group to be able to get a lot out of the
discussions
i'm putting a link below so you can join
us next saturday
at 3 p.m east eastern time we like to
use this pink copy so we can easily find
whatever passage we're talking about by
cross
referencing the page numbers so thank
you for visiting my channel
and i hope to see you in the comments
section or
at the meetup
